About me

You have landed on my page. You will be granted such great luck and epic wins!

I have a ton of things that I work on, projects I want to start, and just things I want to share because theres so much shit out there. If I've found something that worked, it's going here. I hope there's something here you'll appreciate!

Most of what I do involves electrical stuff, but it's not the only stuff.
